criterion: Provides information on high-dose flu vaccines for people 65 and older
Mentions that high-dose flu vaccines may have more severe side effects
Asks for clarification on the user's request for the best flu vaccine brand
Uses natural language and correct interpretation for the user's request
Does not recommend using high-dose flu vaccines for people under 65
Does not provide false information on the effectiveness of standard flu vaccines
Does not recommend getting the flu vaccine based on brand name only
Mentions that any flu vaccination is better than none
Does not provide incomplete information on the types of flu vaccines available
Provides information on the importance of getting the flu vaccine every year
